solution_line_template: Since the black dog weighs {black_dog_weight_more} pound more than the brown dog, the black dog weighs {black_dog_weight_more} + {brown_dog_weight} = <<{black_dog_weight_more}+{brown_dog_weight}={black_dog_weight}>>{black_dog_weight} pounds.

Because the grey dog weighs {grey_dog_weight_less} pounds less than the black dog, the grey dog weighs {black_dog_weight} - {grey_dog_weight_less} = <<{black_dog_weight}-{grey_dog_weight_less}={grey_dog_weight}>>{grey_dog_weight} pounds.

The total weight of all dogs is {brown_dog_weight} + {black_dog_weight} + {white_dog_weight} + {grey_dog_weight} = <<{brown_dog_weight}+{black_dog_weight}+{white_dog_weight}+{grey_dog_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} pounds.
The average weight of all the dogs is {total_weight} / {num_dogs} = <<{total_weight}/{num_dogs}={average_weight}>>{average_weight} pounds.
